name: circled-me
description: Circled is a minimalist, self-hosted social feed aggregator that combines news, RSS, and social posts into one streamlined UI. It helps users stay focused without complex dashboards or recommendations.
features: Feed Aggregator: Combine news, RSS, and social posts. Unified reading.
Minimalist Design: Streamlined UI without clutter. Focused experience.
No Recommendations: Chronological feed without algorithms. Your choice.
RSS Integration: Follow blogs and news sites. Traditional feeds.
Social Posts: Aggregate social media content. One place.
Self-Hosted: Keep your reading habits private. Data control.
